oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Trinity River Band - 2018-11-10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Trinity River Band as part of the Bluegrass and Beyond celebration from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on November 10, 1018. Band consists of family members Brianna Harris-fiddle, Joshua Harris-banjo and dobro, Lisa Harris-bass, Michael Harris-guitar and Sarah Harris-mandolin and lead vocals. Performance four of four.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Trinity River band;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Introductory comments from Sarah Harris with partial band introductions / (17:08) Performs Heart Strings / (20:!4) Partial band introductions / (22:22) Performs Times A Crooked Thing / (25:55) Introduction of the next song / (27:10) Performs Mindbender / (30:34) Joshua talks about his musical history and influences / (32:03) Brianna talks about her musical history and influences / (32:39) Sarah talks about her musical history and influences / (33:19) Lisa talks about her musical history and influences / (34:43) Michael talks about his musical history, influences and the family's musical beginnings / (36:22) Jim Hurst talks about his musical history / (37:37) Sarah talks about her recent history / (38:09) Introduces the next song / (38:22) Performs Then She Cried / (41:56) Introduces the next song / (43:25) Performs Been So Long / (47:34) Introduces the next song and reintroduction of Sarah Harris Hall / (49:01) Performs How Blue / (52:26) Introduction of the next song and merchandise pitch / (53:56) Performs Come Back Train / (57:11) Closing comments / (58:03) Walk-out music / (01:00:10) FILE END
